welcome_message_body: Welcome to Brecksville, a charming city known for its serene nature and historic landmarks. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Hopkins International Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Hangar
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Fulton International Airport, where most domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal is where all cargo and freight shipments are processed and handled at Fulton International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free, but may experience slower speeds during peak hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves airlines such as United and Southwest.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
